```{r exercise 2.1}
#function to calculate summary statistics for each variable
summary.stats <- function(variable){
  
  min.var <- min(variable)
  max.var <- max(variable)
  mean.var <- mean(variable)
  med.var <- median(variable)
  sd.var <- sd(variable)
  
  #arranging data in a df and naming columns
  variable.summary <- data.frame(mean.var, med.var, sd.var, min.var, max.var)
  colnames(variable.summary) <- c("Mean", "Median", "Standard Deviation",
                                  "Minimum", "Maximum")
  #returning the summary stats
  return(variable.summary)
  
}

#kable example
hist(sporting$Sales, main="Histogram of Sales", xlab = "Sales ($)", , col="firebrick")
ss <- as.data.frame(summary.stats(sporting$Sales))
knitr::kable(ss)

```
